title: Humble Bitcoiners
author: Humble Bitcoiners
content: Bitcoin Lightning Shirt from Hodlcat Heya fellow Bitcoiners, a Buddy from Germany creates cool Bitcoinstickers & just did a Shirt version of the "Eddie" SickerIf a few people are interested in the States i would do a group order of the Shirt. It's 30$ & comes with 25 additional stickersMetal up your ass BuddysðŸ¤—[center[/center]https://twitter.com/Hodlcat21/status/1713169319025099119?t=nuTJeIKI3Gq-NonXh-EPhA&s=19

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Definitely in for one here that's awesome

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Ahhhh I can't say no to this one. Thanks for the offer, Humble!Here's the soundtrack for the shirt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=We_DLCYDaYwTbh I am similar excited for the stickers as I am for the shirt itself, haha.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: if he can do 2xl - I am down for one

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: @Mopar...will contact all interested people after a while to check the needed sizeðŸ˜‰ðŸ¤—@Kryptowerk...Bud, Hodlcat is from Germany. You can get one from him directly. It's cheap & fast to order from lovely HodlcatDid the Thread for a group buy to ship a package to the States to save shipping costs

comments.author: Box Guy
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on October 15, 2023, 06:01:53 PMAhhhh I can't say no to this one. Thanks for the offer, Humble!Here's the soundtrack for the shirt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=We_DLCYDaYwTbh I am similar excited for the stickers as I am for the shirt itself, haha. Shirt gives me more Bruce Dickinson vibes than Metallica but fuck yeaâ€¦.i love both bands.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Great way to mix up your metal, Iron Maiden and Bitcoin!These look great.I'm in Europe toi so will contact Hodlcat directly.

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: @aoluain, yes for Europeans it's cheap to get a single one shipped in a bigger envelope. Hodlcat is worth to contact. A die hard Bitcoiner like most of us hereðŸ˜‰

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Might be able to give you some updates about the item and the stickers soon since I ordered one aswell. This shouldnt take so long since I live in the same country of the artist. As soon as it arrives I will share some pictures with you guys.

comments.author: Hodlcat
comments.body: Hi guys,time to get active here  If you have any questions about the shirts, let me know!The shirts are from Imperial sons and come in all sizes. I collect orders until I've reached a few and then ask my partner to print the shirts. Single shirts can be shipped relatively cheap as 2$ inside of Germany or 4$ outside of Germany.If wanted, I could also send one big batch with all the collected shirts as a package for the US and send to one single person who distributes there. Let me know what works best for you

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: THERE'S NO ADDITIONAL POSTAGE ON THIS GROUP ORDER...it's all included hereðŸ˜‰ðŸ¤©

comments.author: Hodlcat
comments.body: [/quote]Hello Hodlcat, I love the design of your shirt graphic. It reminds me of a retro concert tee-shirt.Â  Â I look forward to embracing the style and giving this shirt a wear.Â  [/quote]Hi Eclipse,thank you for your support!Â   The shirts are already in production and should be out for shipping soon.

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: Hey folks, i ordered the Shirts from Hodlcat & will send them to MJ asap. He will save them in your "Christmas box" at the Headquarter & will forward it to every buyer

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Little bump from my side.Because I live in the same country as hodlcat anyway, I contacted him directly to relieve our Humble Bitcoiner a little. Again with an extra wish, of course. In the cold seasona hoodie with the print came to mind more than a T-shirt.Yesterday the hoodie arrived in the post along with lots of stickers. The quality of the print is really stunnin' but just see for yourself:

I had to flex with it because I had it with me while I was taking this picture. But don't worry, it's not the one that was stolen at the Bitcoin conference in Miami in May!

comments.author: Humble Bitcoiners
comments.body: The Shirts are on their way to the MJ Headquarter & should arrive in around 1,5 weeks...i put in additional stickers that i bought from HodlcatðŸ˜‰
